page.title: 10The Mayor of Much Wenlock.
page.content: The{Mayor of Much Wenlock}is elected by the{Town Council.}The old Mayor asks for nominations for the position of Mayor for the coming year. The Deputy Mayor usually becomes the new Mayor but not always. The Mayor then becomes the{Chairman of the {Council. This years mayor is{Mr. Higgs who is Mayor for the third time. He feels that it is an honour to be Mayor and to represent the town of Much Wenlock. Mr. Higgs lives in Much Wenlock and used to be a trader in the town. The Mayor attends many functions. He opens{fetes}and{fayres}especially those raising money for charities. The Mayor has a{ceremonial robe}which is red with fur linings. He has a {black hat,}a{white cravat}and a{chain {of office.
